description.short: Authenticate users with Firebase Authentication - Email/Password, Google Sign-In, and more
description.long: Complete Firebase Authentication implementation for MIT App Inventor. This extension provides a comprehensive solution for user authentication including Email/Password authentication, Google Sign-In, Facebook Login, Phone Authentication, and Anonymous Sign-In. It includes advanced features like password reset, email verification, and user profile management. Perfect for apps that require secure user authentication and authorization.

changelog.changes: Added Google Sign-In support, improved error handling, and fixed minor bugs
Complete rewrite with better error handling and support for Firebase SDK 9
Added phone authentication and email verification features
